about_the_game:
“Beach Episode” - a spin-off DLC

For many months, Mary was dying from her work from home, Christie was dying from boredom even with a book in her hand, and Kat was still working in the restaurant - and for what? To take a big breather, of course! And we only want to help a little, with a ticket to a beautiful lakeside beach. Under the sweltering sun and the shadows of gorgeous women’s silhouettes.

Of course, there will be other girls on this tourist site. Both us and the MC have to get ready for it. Stock up on sun cream, swimming trunks and make sure your inflatable ring does not deflate. We, in turn, will make sure to finish the DLC in time.

“Beach Episode” will have a complex location with many activities. The event is repeatable, so you can go there every weekend:

  • 4 new locations;

  • 5 familiar beauties ready for anything;

  • 6+ animated scenes.

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC contains nudity and sexual adult content that some viewers may find offensive: oral, titjob, vaginal, anal. This DLC contains swearing and use of alcohol.

The original game is intended for adults only and contains sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.

The original game contains nudity, consensual and non-consensual sex, violence, sexual violcene (rape, abuse, fake hypnosis), alternative lifestyles, blackmail, use and sale of alcohol and drugs, swearing, BDSM, H-scenes of oral, vaginal, anal and non-penetrative sexual acts.
